all_questions.question: What is the focus of the fourth lecture on statistical machine translation?
all_questions.context: Welcome to the fourth lecture on statistical machine translation.

all_questions.question: What topic will be covered in this lecture?
all_questions.context: This lecture is devoted to alignment of documents, sentences and then words.

all_questions.question: How are the techniques of machine translation relevant in neural machine translation?
all_questions.context: So the alignment part of these techniques are still relevant even for neural machine translation and all of the techniques were highly critical for the previous state-of-the-art, the phrase-based approach to machine translation.

all_questions.question: What was the state-of-the-art approach in machine translation before this lecture?
all_questions.context: the phrase-based approach to machine translation.
